00029 #ifndef SPI_H

00031 
00032 #ifdef USE_SPI
00033

00035 #include "mcu_periph/spi_arch.h"
00036 
00037 extern uint8_t* spi_buffer_input;
00038 extern uint8_t* spi_buffer_output;

00040 
00041 extern volatile bool_t spi_message_received;
00042 
00043 void spi_init(void);
00044 
00045 #ifdef SPI_MASTER
00046 
00047 #define SPI_NONE   0
00048 #define SPI_SLAVE0 1
00049 #define SPI_SLAVE1 2
00050 #define SPI_SLAVE2 3
00051 
00052 extern volatile uint8_t spi_cur_slave;
00053 extern uint8_t spi_nb_ovrn;
00054 
00055 #define SpiCheckAvailable() (spi_cur_slave == SPI_NONE)
00056 #define SpiOverRun() {spi_nb_ovrn++;}
00057 
00058 #endif /* SPI_MASTER */
